FAQQ1: que moneda se usa para NFTs?
FAQA1: Kusama, $KSM. You can get it through our Credit feature or through custodial exchange.

FAQQ7: como comienzo cuando ya sea creador de NFT?

Wait till Collection is minted, then you go to Create Token and Mint your very first token! If you had issues, we are working on our UX-flow. FAQQ10: What does SEND, CONSUME, LIST mean?
FAQA10: SEND will send it to someone, CONSUME will burn it, LIST will list it for sale so someone can buy it from you.
